data.name: Ascension
data.detailed_description:
Story


Ascension is a casual single-player platformer focused on sexual content. Follow along with a fallen angel's journey to rise back to the clouds while facing temptations set by humans and monsters alike. Experience combat as you progress through a castle garden, break into the crypts to face knights and rogue monsters, traverse deeper into the dungeon facing greater threats to finally ascend back to where you belong in the clouds.

Contains


Four separate maps each containing:

  • Fifteen map specific stages
  • At least three new enemies introduced
  • A boss fight to conclude each section
  • A soundtrack dedicated to the specific map

data.short_description: Ascension is a casual single-player platformer highly focused on sexual content. Follow along with a fallen angel's journey to rise back to the clouds while facing temptations set by humans and monsters alike.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 696 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Internal

data.legal_notice: All assets used in this application belong to their rightful owners. For more information involving royalties and assets please contact ivampieyt@gmail.com

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains depictions of sexual content in 2D pixel-art form which cannot be turned off/censored in any way.

Graphic sexual content may be engaged with humanoid and monster creatures, both female and male.

Sexual intercourse can be engaged forcibly with the female-controlled protagonist by enemies.
